verses.verse: That <S%G3739>which<s%> was from the <S%G746>beginning,<s%> <S%G3739>which<s%> we have <S%G191>heard,<s%> <S%G3739>which<s%> we have <S%G3708>seen<s%> with our <S%G3788>eyes,<s%> <S%G3739>which<s%> we have <S%G2300>looked<s%> on, and our <S%G5495>hands<s%> have <S%G5584>handled,<s%> of the <S%G3056>Word<s%> of <S%G2222>life;<s%>

(For the <S%G2222>life<s%> was <S%G5319>manifested,<s%> and we have <S%G3708>seen<s%> it, and <S%G3140>bear<s%> <S%G3140>witness,<s%> and <S%G518>show<s%> to you that <S%G166>eternal<s%> <S%G2222>life,<s%> <S%G3748>which<s%> was with the <S%G3962>Father,<s%> and was <S%G5319>manifested<s%> to us;)

That <S%G3739>which<s%> we have <S%G3708>seen<s%> and <S%G191>heard<s%> <S%G518>declare<s%> we to you, that you <S%G2532>also<s%> may <S%G2192>have<s%> <S%G2842>fellowship<s%> with us: and <S%G1161>truly<s%> our <S%G2842>fellowship<s%> is with the <S%G3962>Father,<s%> and with his <S%G5207>Son<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G5547>Christ.<s%>
And <S%G5023>these<s%> things <S%G1125>write<s%> we to you, that <S%G5216>your<s%> <S%G5479>joy<s%> may be <S%G4137>full.<s%>

<S%G3778>This<s%> <S%G2532>then<s%> is the <S%G1860>message<s%> <S%G3739>which<s%> we have <S%G191>heard<s%> of him, and <S%G312>declare<s%> to you, that <S%G2316>God<s%> is <S%G5457>light,<s%> and in him is <S%G3756>no<s%> <S%G4653>darkness<s%> <S%G3762>at<s%> <S%G3762>all.<s%>

<S%G1437>If<s%> we <S%G2036>say<s%> that we <S%G2192>have<s%> <S%G2842>fellowship<s%> with him, and <S%G4043>walk<s%> in <S%G4655>darkness,<s%> we <S%G5574>lie,<s%> and <S%G4160>do<s%> not the <S%G225>truth:<s%>

But <S%G1437>if<s%> we <S%G4043>walk<s%> in the <S%G5457>light,<s%> as he is in the <S%G5457>light,<s%> we <S%G2192>have<s%> <S%G2842>fellowship<s%> <S%G3391>one<s%> with <S%G240>another,<s%> and the <S%G129>blood<s%> of <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G5547>Christ<s%> his <S%G5207>Son<s%> <S%G2511>cleans<s%> us from <S%G3956>all<s%> <S%G266>sin.<s%>
<S%G1437>If<s%> we <S%G2036>say<s%> that we <S%G2192>have<s%> <S%G3756>no<s%> <S%G266>sin,<s%> we <S%G4105>deceive<s%> <S%G1438>ourselves,<s%> and the <S%G225>truth<s%> is not in us.

<S%G1437>If<s%> we <S%G3670>confess<s%> our <S%G266>sins,<s%> he is <S%G4103>faithful<s%> and <S%G1342>just<s%> to <S%G863>forgive<s%> us our <S%G266>sins,<s%> and to <S%G2511>cleanse<s%> us from <S%G3956>all<s%> <S%G93>unrighteousness.<s%>
<S%G1437>If<s%> we <S%G2036>say<s%> that we have not <S%G264>sinned,<s%> we <S%G4160>make<s%> him a <S%G5583>liar,<s%> and his <S%G3056>word<s%> is not in us.
